about_the_game:
This DLC comes with all the reward renders from the game + additional extra images + a walkthrough guide PDF which will help you to unlock everything and get out the most of the game! It is also a life saver if you ever got stuck on some of the tricky puzzles and riddles awaiting you in the game.

You will get:
  • All the sexy rewards from the game for all the PCs - Olivia, Sasha, Patricia and Peter
  • Total of 40 images + 8 extra
  • PDF document explaining how to approach the game and hinting how to guess all the passwords + section (labelled as spoiler) containing all the correct passwords, rationale behind them and which folders they belong to!

How to access the files?
  • Right click on the game in Steam
  • Click Properties and Local Files tab
  • Click on Browse Local Files
  • You will see the folder called Sneaky IT Support - Art Pack & Walkthrough Guide and inside, you will find both the PDF and the folder with the images!

Enjoy!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Did you get stuck trying to snoop in all the computers? Can't crack a difficult password? Or you are just curious about why certain password was chosen and where it was hinted? In any case, this guide has you covered and as a bonus, it also adds all the reward renders from the game and more!
